Search Engine

NOTE: None of MCIâ€™s projects are open source. So, I am not allowed to share the code which I have developed in this project.

Introduction

Zarebin is certainly the most accurate, fast and efficient search engine launched in Iran so far and appears to be slowly gaining traction recently coming out with its own browser and search app for android devices.

Technologies/Languages Used

Technology Usage
Python is used for developing the application
Kafka is used to produce collected data
FastAPI is used for API Gateway
Elasticsearch is used for data storage and content search
Docker is used for virtualization and containerizing services
Git is used for version control
